attributes.action: reimburse domestic cleaning costs to everyone from the public purse following the precident created by the Prime Minister
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we live in a democracy so why not follow Gordon Browns fine example - this IS NOT outside of remit or powers of the Government - if so how can MPs claim such expenses

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
